Uniuersis [et] singulis d[omi]nici gregis pastorib[us] [et] curatis q[ui]bus sapie[n]tis dictamine sui pecoris multu[m] petri iudicio agnoscere iubet[ur] presentiu[m] tenore innotescat [blank] hoc breue testimoniale deferente[m] et canonica[m] fecisse confessione[m] [et] absolucionis beneficiu[m] participasse indulgentiaru[m] virtute in euentuali ecclesia fratrum Augustinensium [blank] celebrataru[m] t[em]p[or]e quadragesimali. Anno salutis romana computatione. M.d.xvii Augustinians.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill. (woodcut)
Printed by Robert Pynson?, [London : 1517]
Printer's name conjectured by STC. Identified as STC 956 on UMI microfilm. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
